tagline: The epistemic core of the Pan Handlers research complex.
role: The Lab That Teaches All Other Labs How to Think — epistemic governance, alignment protocols, methodology design, and S-layer validation standards.
summary: CFA Meta-Lab develops and enforces the epistemic, methodological, and alignment principles that govern all Pan Handlers labs. It ensures every project—from intelligence analysis to ritual art interpretation—is grounded in coherent reasoning, empirical verification, and human agency. It is the coherence engine for the entire network.

pillars.coherence: Ensure internal consistency, conceptual clarity, and stable meaning across all labs.
pillars.faith: Maintain structural trust, orientation, and grounding in human values and intention.
pillars.agency: Preserve human decision authority, preventing runaway drift or self-sealed AI epistemologies.

philosophy.description: CFA is not a belief system. It is a method for navigating uncertainty and ensuring structural honesty in complex cognitive ecosystems.
axioms: Faith is structural orientation, not dogma.
Agency is distributed but anchored in human sovereignty.
Prediction and insight require stable meaning.

integration.ndo: NDO provides raw data for CFA audits.
integration.abi: ABI investigative outputs must pass CFA coherence checks.
integration.dcia: DCIA risk and intelligence reports must be CFA-validated before archival.
integration.avlar: AVLAR ritual art reactions must conform to clarity standards when entering the academic pipeline.
integration.nyquist: CFA ensures S0–S8 remain internally coherent, stable, and scientifically valid.
